Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Model of a vase in the shape of a jar with a very long neck, which is slightly flared near the top, and a small, flat circular base. A lump of clay at the base makes it impossible for the vessel to stand up straight, thus giving it its tilted stance.
